example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (DP (DT 这) (CLP (M 张))) (NP (NN CD))) (VP (ADVP (AD 还)) (VP (VE 有) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 曲))) (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (IP (NP-SBJ-3 (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (PP-LGS (P 由) (NP (NP-PN (NR 马修)) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 温柔) (PU 、) (VA 清扬))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 嗓音)))) (VP (VV 独唱) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-3)))))) (NP-TTL (PU 「) (LCP (NP (NN 床)) (LC 边)) (NP (NN 故事)) (PU 」))) (PU ，) (VP (PP-PRD (P 以) (NP (CP (WHNP-4 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 个))) (NP (NN 父亲))) (VP (NP-MNR (-NONE- *T*-4)) (VP (VV 唱) (PP-BNF (P 给) (NP (DNP (NP (PN 他)) (DEG 的)) (ADJP (JJ 小)) (NP (NN 儿女))))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 口吻)))))))))
